Reviews.Title: Surveillance Cameras
Reviews.Author: Sandra Brown
Reviews.Content: They were perfect.  They were easy to put up and they worked well. I recommend this product for anyone who needs this type of product.

ProductInfo.Features:
COLOR Weatherproof (Indoor/Outdoor) camera, super CMOS camera provides 420 TV lines video image
Built-in IR cutter improves the color during daytime.Built-in 27 infrared LEDs provide 45 feet night vision range
Professional quality and durable design
Connect to VCR or DVR to record. Built-in microphone. One way audio.
Video output: RCA / Composite jack
ProductInfo.Name: 2 Pack of Hi-res Outdoor/indoor Supercmos Wired Night Vision Color Surveillance Camer/security Camera
